articles.title: Hero's return for astronaut Shaun the Sheep - BBC
articles.description: Europe's space mascot comes home "alive and wool" to Bristol after a 1.5 million mile journey around the Moon.
articles.content:
It was a giant leap for lamb-kind, but now he's baa-ck.
Shaun the Sheep has returned to Britain after taking part in the US space agency's (Nasa) epic mission to the Moon last year.
A model of the … [+4229 chars]
